title: 4800ip champ/6300ip
body: So im in BRONZE. so im not faker. REMEMBER THAT. Anyone i was wondering what champ i should buy 4800ip or should i save up(6300ip). I mainly play jg and want to main jg. But i do play top sometimes. Thanks. It cant be a hard to play champ.

replies.body: I like more dmg heavy jglers
Try Volibear, he actually does a lot of damage while being tanky and his passive makes him incredibly hard to kill. His q is amazing utility as well.

So you want damage heavy junglers, but how much survivability do you want? How much utility do you want? Gank potential?

Yi is great in Jungle, can survive easy and farm no worries once you get his timing right, can gank well with his Q that chases when they try to escape, has a good ult to make sure you can't be slowed when you are chasing them, but he has no survivability, no utility and gets stopped with ease when they use hard CC. If you can learn to play him well, late game he is a monster with stacked devourer, an experienced Yi can get full stacks around 15 minutes.

That is just one idea of how a champ works, you give me some more information and I will assist you further.

FYI - Eve is similar to Yi, She can survive a bit better thanks to her ult, but can't chase as easy, although her ganks give better placement. Just remember to build her as AD, it's better late game.

Hey, I would like a champ with a bit of utility but is very effective at ganking. I don't mind not being tanky.

Ok so we have Shaco, Rengar and Ekko, they all have some utility, good ganking and can hit hard, although they can die fast, but have good escapes.

You can get a little more survivability and tankiness, but if you build them as damage you have Volibear, Nasus, Olaf, Jax, Skarner and Udyr. They will all give you some better ganking since you can last longer and have better utility, but less damage straight up. Given the better utility, they can hold an enemy in lane longer and therefore be better at ganking.

Really, unless you can hit hard enough to kill someone before they run away, I would look at these in this order on how easy they are:
Voli - Flip/throw
Nasus - Slow
Jax - Stun
Olaf - Slow (can pick up his axe to lower his CD)
Skarner - Stun
Udyr - Stun
What about j4. I have Jax, udyr, Olaf, Nasus, and most 3150 jungles. Should I get J4 or voli?
I say Voli, J4 can be good, but his Ult is useless if they have an escape of any sort. Voli has his throw and slow and can be built full tank and still do some damage.
